course_description: This course will assist students in navigating the intricacies of working in teams. Students will build teamwork and leadership skills and will engage in debriefing, reflection, and coaching. Recommended to be taken in junior year.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4908, Section #: 1101, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: J. Billetdeaux, Status: Closed
